title: Resident Evil 7 offers Cross-Buy on Xbox One and Windows 10
text:
Resident Evil 7 offers Cross-Buy on Xbox One and Windows 10 Microsoft is the new master of unlocking. By Jeffrey Matulef Published 18/01/2017 
Resident Evil 7 will be a Cross-Buy affair on Xbox One and Windows 10, meaning that if you buy it on one platform you'll get it on both. 
The news was just confirmed by head of Xbox Phil Spencer on Twitter . 
This should make Microsoft's platforms more competitive with the PS4 version, which supports PlayStation VR - something that will be exclusive for a year. 
Resident Evil 7 is launching just next week on 24th January. For more on the game, you can watch the above video of our Resi expert Aoife Wilson gushing about its oldschool survival horror atmosphere, which she felt lost nothing in its switch to first-person. Having played Resi 7 for five hours , she'd know.
